text: Ratu Sir Penaia Kanatabatu Ganilau (28 July 1918 â€“ 15 December 1993) was the first President of Fiji, serving from 8 December 1987 until his death in 1993. He was Governor-General of Fiji from 12 February 1983 to 15 October 1987. Ganilau died on 15 December 1993 in Washington, D.C. from sepsis caused by leukemia at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1918 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:Presidents of Fiji
title: Penaia Ganilau
